scripts._devComment: Command '>npm run dev' for development with hot reload uses local package from ../app-core
scripts._buildComment: uses package from Git repository for app-core
scripts.build: npm run deps:prod && vite build --mode lib
scripts.build:lib: npm run deps:prod && vite build --mode lib
